This is a list of Pathfinder books for the Pathfinder Roleplaying Game fantasy role-playing game.

Contents

  • 1 Pathfinder Roleplaying Game Books
  • 2 Pathfinder Adventure Path Books
  • 3 Pathfinder Campaign Setting Books
  • 4 References
  • 5 External links
